title: Did Phil Spector record an unforgivable song for his former partner?
subtitle: Spector was an American record producer in the '60s that author Tom Wolfe described as "the first taekon of teenagers."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Phil Spector deliberately recorded an undetectable song called "The Pin" in order to deceive his former partner from the payments of royalties ordered by the court.
